Name: Mini Mecum
About the game: What does it mean to be? What does 'it' mean? Two bees? What? Mini Mecum is a walking simulator about having weird conversations in pretty places. Explore gorgeous hand-crafted environments as you discuss bizarre and existentialist topics with a variety of surreal characters. Featuring: Four unique environments to explore! Over 1,200 lines of dialogue! Mind-Bending geometry and locales! Existentialist dread regarding the fate of the cosmos and our place within them! An adaptive soundtrack! At least three elevators! (Four, actually) Him.
